thread.title: BRIEF-Organovo Holdings- Entered Sales Agreement Where Co May Offer, Sell Shares In 'At Market' Sales Transactions With Offering Price Of Up To $50 Million

title: BRIEF-Organovo Holdings- Entered Sales Agreement Where Co May Offer, Sell Shares In 'At Market' Sales Transactions With Offering Price Of Up To $50 Million
text: Market News March 16, 2018 / 9:45 PM / Updated 28 minutes ago BRIEF-Organovo Holdings- Entered Sales Agreement Where Co May Offer, Sell Shares In 'At Market' Sales Transactions With Offering Price Of Up To $50 Million Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 16 (Reuters) - Organovo Holdings Inc: * ORGANOVO HOLDINGS- ENTERED SALES AGREEMENT WHERE CO MAY OFFER, SELL SHARES IN ‘AT MARKET’ SALES TRANSACTIONS WITH OFFERING PRICE OF UP TO $50 MILLION * ORGANOVO HOLDINGS - INTENDS TO USE NET PROCEEDS FROM SALE OF SECURITIES FOR OPERATING COSTS, RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2DyOUd8 ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
